document_data.name: Voltinabulai
document_data.mainbody:
'''Voltinabulai''', who also went by '''Voltine''', was a [[druid]] that lived in [[Baldur's Gate]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|Mmn, how impertinent of you to spy on a lady as she's changing.}}
document_data.Abilities: As a [[shapeshifter (kit)|shapeshifter]] druid, Voltine was afflicted with [[lycanthropy]] but had complete control over her transformation.
document_data.Possessions: She carried on her person a ''[[wand of polymorphing]]''.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, Voltine caught a [[mage]] by the name of [[Gervisse]] lurking around a building in the [[Baldur's Gate/Upper City|Upper City]] of Baldur's Gate, spying on two twin children, [[Laerta]] and [[Louise]]. She would transform herself in order to check in on the children and protect them from the old spellcaster.
